Detailed Description

Contains a list of the modules known by the leader.

In addition to the normal header this packet contains {tabular}{lll} Pos & Size & \ HEADER_SIZE & 4 bytes & Size of list \ for each & 4 bytes & IP \ & 2 bytes & Port {tabular}
